name: wool-webconsole
author: Nicolas Lochet <nicolas.lochet@gmail.com>
description: a webconsole tool to debug a wool rule system

scripts.start: if [ ! -f example/data/events.db ];then echo -n '' > example/data/events.db; fi && node app/cli.js example/rules/index.js -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
scripts.watch: nodemon -V -w app/cli.js -w index.js -w app/server/ -w example/rules/ app/cli.js -- example/rules/index.js -d -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
